about_the_game:
Gradient Flow is a free-to-play minimalist racing game.

This demo focuses on the time attack aspect of Gradient Flow.
Race against the timer on a set of tracks, beat specific targets to earn medals and unlock more tracks!
Experience the ultimate smoothness of our custom physics engine!

Do your best, put your name on the leaderboards.

More content to come with full release:
- multiplayer
- track editor
- customization options
